data.name: Track Craft
data.description:
Bend the laws of physics and shape the wildest racetracks ever imagined by turning any ordinary space into an adrenaline-pumping mixed-reality circuit. Let the race begin!

CRAFT. SHARE. RACE. REPEAT.

Track Craft Features:

* 3 Unique Track Packs: Enjoy three specially curated bundles, each offering new cars, tracks, challenges, playful aesthetics, dynamic music, and fun surprises.
* Arcade Mode: Conquer over 50 pre-designed levels and unlock all car styles and features.
* New Car Physics: Our revamped car physics ensures every race is an edge-of-your-seat adventure.
* Free Drive Mode: Thanks to Quest 3's room scanning feature, you can roam freely on your room's floors, walls, furniture, pets, kids â€“ you name it!
* Custom Editor: Unleash your creativity with an easy-to-use editor, featuring crafting blocks, gravity-defying pieces and fun materials.
*Community Sharing: Share your custom tracks and compete against other players


Available on Quest 3, Quest Pro, and Quest 2.

Upcoming Features :

* Trackmania-Style Multiplayer
* Manga Style Track Pack: New design, cars, and special pieces.
* Improved Community Levels
* Garage Feature
* Live Multiplayer (2024)

Download Track Craft and experience the untamed thrill of racing beyond the limits of reality.

changelog.change_log:
Track Craft v 0.47 is here: Marry Christmas & Happy Track Crafting!

New features
* Added a new Christmas chapter of Razzle Dazzle along with a new car
* Christmas props are also available in the editor for Christmas Track Crafting
* A new GamerTag special Panda car skin in Razzle Dazzle as a gift for our favorite content creator ;)
* New banner prop in specials / Razzle Dazzle - Hello Gamer Tag again!

Improvements
* Razzle Dazzle start/finish pieces now skin properly based on track materials in editor + community levels

Bug fixes
* Fixed default game position to prevent "in wall" stuck states

Improvements
 - Added new Razzle Dazzle portal design + VFX 
- Ground shadows are now on by default, even without room mesh 
- Car now freezes when you change your guardian
- makes it easier to change scale playtime & no more cheating ;)
- Gravity on all props & cars - especially on Room Mesh is now more accurate 
- Changed the way props & floating pieces work when using room mesh - they now pivot to room mesh + scale with it 

Bugfixes
- The game is now bound properly to the guardian center - so when you go in/out or put the headset from sleep - the level position will not break
- The turntable in Surf Rock now works properly
- Editor palette is fixed in big/small scale sizes - The next button in tutorial levels is now visible only after stars are gained 

HAPPY TRACK CRAFTING!
Fixed bug that caused track editor to work incorrectly on Quest 2
